name: InfluenzaBoneMarrowTransplantICD10
title: Influenza Bone Marrow Transplant ICD10
description: This value set includes codes used in Lantana's ICD10PCS value set (currently in draft status and subject to change) needed for the IMM2 measure.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set identifies patients who have had a bone marrow transplant procedure using ICD10PCS codes .),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had a procedure where bone marrow has been transplanted.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only include ICD10PCS codes which identify patients who have had a procedure of a bone marrow transplant.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
